results.text_hl: BFOV + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ significantly decreased serum @GENE_GPT @GENE_76282 @@@ALT@@@ and @GENE_SLC17A5 @GENE_235504 @@@AST@@@ activities and reduced hepatic @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@ content and @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_18126 @@@iNOS@@@ activities, accompanied by ameliorating intrahepatic @<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat accumulation@@@ and hepatocellular vacuolation.

results.title: Metformin Prevents Key Mechanisms of Obesity-Related Complications in Visceral White Adipose Tissue of Obese Pregnant Mice
results.text_hl: On gestational day G15.5, phenotypic data were collected and perigonadal WAT (pgWAT) morphology and proteome were examined. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment reduced @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@visceral fat accumulation@@@.

results.title: Metformin-loaded PLGA microspheres combined with an in situ-formed injectable SA/BG hydrogel alleviate rotator cuff muscle degeneration
results.text_hl: In this study, an in situ-formed injectable @CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@sodium alginate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@SA@@@) and bioglass (BG) hydrogel consisting of @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@poly (lactic-co-glycolic acid)@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@) microspheres containing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@SA@@@/BG-PLGA-Met) was developed for the prevention of muscular @<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat@@@ infiltration and @DISEASE_Retinal_Dystrophies @DISEASE_MESH:D058499 @@@dystrophy@@@.

results.title: Moderate exercise combined with metformin-treatment improves mitochondrial bioenergetics of the quadriceps muscle of old female Wistar rats.
results.text_hl: Our research group has shown that the combined treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@) and exercise has beneficial effects for preventing @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle loss@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat accumulation@@@, by modulating the redox state.

results.title: Comparison of the effect of liraglutide and metformin therapy on the disease regulation and weight loss in obese patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The effect of the combination of liraglutide 3 mg and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ regulation, @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat loss@@@, muscle conservation) was found to be superior to the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy in the @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ according to the early period results.

results.title: Low Circulating Levels of miR-451a in Girls with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: Different Effects of Randomized Treatments.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: We studied the baseline microRNA (miRNA) profile of girls with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, and the effects of a randomized treatment with an oral contraceptive (OC) or with @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@-@CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (SPIOMET, aiming at loss of hepato-visceral @<m>DISEASE_Embolism_Fat</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat@@@ excess) for 1 year.
